column5: 3 bedroom beach condo not but a block from Gulf of Mexico. Spacious rooms, TVs, washer and dryer and 2 car garage. Fully furnished and equipped kitchen. 2 outside patios, one on upper floor with view of water. Hardwood floors which are easy maintenance with trips to and from beach. Bike and chairs in garage for usage. Information manual in entrance hallway counter for directions to all points of interest.
column8: Wilson Beach House. Fun in the SUN
